title: Drinking: how will Charlie handle it?
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Alcoholism - Study and teaching
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol - Physiological effect
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Decision-making
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol counseling
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol in the body
description: The film presents a variety of social and emotional factors which can influence an individual's decision about drinking. Considers abstinence, drinking in moderation, and a number of consequences of excessive drinking. The film offers no conclusions but is designed to promote thought and discussion about the decision-making process regarding drinking.
